# XmlUtil class

Helpers for converting arbitrary objects into XElement instances.

```csharp
public static class XmlUtil
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [ToXml](XmlUtil/ToXml.md)(…) | Converts an object to an XElement with the specified name, handling nulls, primitives, dictionaries, enumerables, and complex types. |
